Sinopse: 17-year-old Zoe Hull, the daughter of a former US Army sniper, is in her final year of high school. When an armed gang bursts into the school, killing some students and taking the rest hostage, Zoe's first impulse is to escape. However, she decides to stay to try to help others to escape. Her survival skills might even help her even the odds somewhat.—grantss
